Dealer.com coding exercises

Exercise 1: Key Counter

In the textarea below, input key and values in new lines in the form of “key,count”, take a look at the default values.

Results

There are lines written in an invalid form. It should be: "red,3"

    Exercise 2: Palindrome checker

    A palindrome is some text that reads exactly the same left ot right and right to left (like “ada”). In the field below, enter some text to check if it’s a palindrome. The checker will ignore anything that is not a letter (numbers too).

    Result

    It’s a palindrome!

    Not a palindrome
